alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 5:27AM EST until December 24 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 3 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin as snow early this evening, but will transition to freezing rain around 7 PM before tapering off around midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
